name: Lawnmower Game: Mission X
description:
Story:
Lawnmover game Mission x is driving and searching game. Player control again lawnmower and mission is to find 6 stars each level. There is time limit to find those stars which is 100 seconds per level. Every level there is traps like dynamite and spikes. Also levels include 2 following enemies Zombies and Golem. If time ends or player health goes to 0, game is over. Game contains 15 different levels.
After collecting 6 stars level is finished. So be true lawnmower legend and collect all stars and beware dangerous enemies



Features:
- Steam achievements
- Traps like dynamite and spikes
- zombie and golem enemies
- 15 levels
- Health system
